summary: VEHICLE IS LEAKING GASOLINE FROM OR NEAR THE FUEL TANK. THE LEAK APPEARS TO BE LOCATED NEAR THE FUEL FILLER ASSEMBLY. THE LEAK PRODUCES STRONG ODOUR OF GASOLINE IN CABIN AND AROUND VEHICLE BOTH WHEN IN MOTION AND WHEN STOPPED. A LARGE WET STAIN UNDER THE TANK WAS VISIBLE AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED ON GRAVEL FOR ABOUT FIVE HOURS, WITH A STRONG ODOUR OF GASOLINE.    (NOTE ON THE ATTACHED PHOTO OF THE FUEL TANK ID BADGE, SOME INFORMATION IS CUT OFF. ON THE LEFT THE SECOND FROM THE BOTTOM LINE READS "SHIFT 3". THE BOTTOM LINE READS "OCT 26 2010 10:45PM")
